page.title: 16Leisure and Recreation-2
page.content: Proximity to Bath and Bristol enables people to enjoy{theatre,music,art}and {museums.}Local{drama}clubs draw many supporters from the area. There is a Local{History Society}and a {Natural History}Group on the periphery of this area.A Sports Van (sponsored by Wansdyke District Council) tours the villages so offering the opportunity for{trampolining}and {softball}as well as the usual field and ball skills. The River Cam provides excellent trout and coarse{fishing,}besides being of interest to the{botanist}and {ornithologist. {Hot-air ballooning}is becoming an increasingly popular sport,and the area is in frequent use as a landing ground for balloons flying out of Bristol.
